KA.AQWE.content: guardians as crime against human nature, man is made to progress toward enlightenment [telos]

KA.IUHCI.content: philosophers must presume man’s own purpose (Absicht), so it is up to the philosopher to discover an end of nature in senseless march of human events > Kant will become the scientist of human history [?]

KA.IUHCI.content: loss of money a disadvantage of war > cosmopolitan condition as womb (Schooß) for original predispositions of human species (ursprünglichen Anlagen der Menschengattung)
KA.IUHCI.linkedContent: loss of money a disadvantage of war > cosmopolitan condition as womb (Schooß) for original predispositions of human species (ursprünglichen Anlagen der Menschengattung)

KA.IUHCI.content: [Hegel-like] might this conviction in purpose only write a novel? [fiction in philosophy] > we are too short-sighted to perceive the secret mechanism of nature’s plan, a planless conglomeration of human activities could be used as a guide when presented as a SYSTEM > trace of this plan in ever art, culture, law

KA.EP.content: [Geneva convention-like logic against war crimes] a war of extermination, allow eternal peace only upon the graveyard of the whole human race [p. 435 “To Eternal Peace” an innkeeper but on a sign next a painted graveyard]
